author: BV Designs

changelog.release_notes: Version 2.61:  Now available for Pebble Time 2!

Version 2.0: NEW features added! 
- New-look configuration page 
- Improved look and visibility 
- Option to change date formats (UK & US style) 
- Option to vibrate when disconnected
- Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel 
- Date displays the language chosen in user settings

The most delicious watchface you've ever seen!! Watchface displays a pie, with the missing slice representing the current time in analogue format. The remaining piece shows the battery level, digital time, date and AM/PM respectively (if 12 hour). This display will show up in different places on the face depending on the time, showing as much detail as possible. The colours are not customisable, but the when the Bluetooth is disconnected the pie disappears and only the time, battery and date will show (white on black). In the configuration menu, the clock can only be updated every minute if desired to save battery. Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users. Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

description:
Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!
--------------------------------------------------------------------Version 2.0: NEW features added!
- New-look configuration page
- Improved look and visibility
- Option to change date formats (UK & US style) 
- Option to vibrate when disconnected
- Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel
- Date displays the language chosen in user settings

-----------------------------------------------------------------

The most delicious watchface you've ever seen!!

Watchface displays a pie, with the missing slice representing the current time in analogue format.  The remaining piece shows the battery level, digital time, date and AM/PM respectively (if 12 hour).  This display will show up in different places on the face depending on the time, showing as much detail as possible.

The colours are not customisable, but when the Bluetooth is disconnected the pie disappears and only the time, battery and date will show (white on black).  Vibrates with each connection status.

In the configuration menu, the clock can only be updated every minute if desired to save battery. Also the screen invert can be turned on and off for Classic Pebble/Pebble Steel users.

Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2.61:  Now available for Pebble Time 2!

title: PieWatch
